name: Chrono Caverns
description:
This is my entry for Ludum Dare 42. Please rate it and provide feedback if you have a minute https://ldjam.com/events/ludum-dare/42/$11400514005

Story

As a famous explorer in search of treasure, you one day come across a mysterious labyrinthine cavern. Full of puzzles and traps, you explore deeper and deeper in search of the lost treasure. But something is not quite right about this cavern, time seems to flow both forward and backward under your control.

Gameplay

Move through the caverns, floor file by floor tile. Once you leave a tile, it turns into a pool of lava preventing you from going back. Although, once you discover the pendant your gain the ability to control the flow of time and undo your previous movements. Touching every floor tile will unveil a stairway to the next floor, bringing you one step closer to the mysterious treasure.

Controls

Move: Arrow keys

Undo: Z

Return to main menu: Escape

Fullscreen: F
